message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Hopefully we can work something out for round 2.
My turn. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  This is a chance to secure a decent amount, Alice,  before inflation eats into your share even more.

I'm willing to go down to 6000, but I think it's still a fair deal.  If we keep going, my share will continue to decrease while yours stays the same. Let's end this before it gets worse for both of us.
